headline: Seagate CEO Share Sale Prompts Fresh Look At AI Storage Valuation
summary: Seagate Technology Holdings (NasdaqGS:STX) CEO executed a significant insider share sale on 2 February 2026. The transaction followed strong recent operational performance and fresh quarterly results from the company. The sale comes as enthusiasm around AI linked demand for Seagate nearline and HAMR drives remains elevated. Insider selling by a CEO often draws attention from shareholders and potential investors who track management actions closely. Seagate is a major player in hard disk...
